_sText:
**This is the new version to zm_light_feet**

-Large open map with moving platforms
-Traps and controlable jet streams
-teleports for when you fall off the moving platforms
-controlable gates to keep out zombies
-long catwalk for high level fun

This is designed to be a fun zombie map with no pushable items and just lots of fun spots to play with and run to.

=v2=
Cut the sniper catwalk into two catwalks
Added water at teleports to prevent damage on teleport
Lowered teleport trigger
Now with 48 spawns
Made side rooms off of spawn longer


**This version has no lights, but please post feedback and if ppl like this design then I will put lights in**
